name: Color Change (Bredulu)
description:
Color Change is a 2D Puzzle-Plattformer with a twist, you can only change certain elements in the level and the player runs automatically. The elements are color-codet in red, green, and yellow. You can only disabel one color at the time and clear the pathe for the little robot. 

Disclaimer: This is my first game!!! 
I hade not enough time to make soundeffects! (This will be fixed as soon as possible! )
